attributes.action: Make Awareness of Trisomy illnesses to Parents prenatal and postnatal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hello im A parent of a Child who was born with Trisomy 13. I was not given any support when she was born and was told she wouldnt live through out the night. There was no Awareness of this illness but the statistics show that there is the same amount of children diagnoised with trisomy 13/18 as there are with,Cerebral Palsy , All the info i received was from the internet. Parents that find of this illness prenatal Are pushed for an abortion as its Not compatable with life, however my Child was 1 last month and doing well, However she has been denied heart surgery because of her illness , It breaks My heart that someone else has my daughter's life in there Hands. 
I WOULD BE SO GRATEFUL IF YOU WOULD SIGN MY PETITION
